author: fabiocos
body:
Add scenario D39 equal to D38 but for the crystal thickness in the innermost and outermost regions, set as in D35

(cherry picked from commit b6f1baf0b36d6efaff972417aed3b09cbcfcc004)

minor comment by K. Pedro on geometry description

(cherry picked from commit 41eae85e4cb816935ff9817d235952a325ff6f5f)
title: MTD geometry: add scenario D39 equal to D38 but for the crystal thickness [10_4_X backport of 25639]
